name: CormagTalkEirika
_source: speak;Cormag;You don't know me, but you know my brother well enough.|I'm Cormag. I'm the brother of Glen, general of the Grado army, whom you killed?

speak;Cormag;This is no longer war, and this is not a battlefield.|This is a duel, and I fight to avenge my brother.|He died in combat, and I'll not foul his name by murdering you unarmed.|But I will have vengeance.
speak;Eirika;Hold!|What is the meaning of this?|Glen...|Are you telling me General Glen is dead?
speak;Cormag;Do not play me for a fool!|You will not...|Your lies do nothing but stain your honor.|Nothing more.
speak;Eirika;You've got it wrong!|You're making a mistake.|Your brother and I never fought.|He lowered his lance and left the battlefield to confront your emperor.
speak;Cormag;...My brother?|You lie!|Where is your proof?
speak;Eirika;I've no proof.|But...|Here are the words he spoke to me.|He told me he believed I possessed a gentle heart when we met before.|He said I had not lost that quality...
speak;Cormag;I see...|Those are indeed my brother's words.|But then who?|Who benefits from-|...Ah! ...Valter!
speak;Cormag;...Princess Eirika of Renais.|I would be your ally.

speak;Cormag;I don't care why you're fighting.|I've no interest in your goals.|I want nothing but revenge, and I will have it.|If I can kill Valter with these two hands either by <red>Axe</> or by <red>Lance</>, what care I if Grado brands me a traitor?
